content: In the third quarter, revenues increased by 9% year-over-year to approximately RMB 317 million as a result of the increase in revenues from processing fees and storage fees. The group recruited 18,985 new subscribers during the third quarter, which represents an increase of approximately 7% year-over-year, despite challenges from COVID-19 and the downward newborn trend. As a result, revenues generated from processing fees and other services increased by approximately 10% year-over-year to RMB 181 million, which accounted for 57% of total revenues, similar to last year. As a result of top line growth, combined with cost control measures, operating income increased by approximately 21% year-over-year to approximately RMB 150 million in the third quarter. Taking into account labor costs savings, sales and marketing expenses in the third quarter decreased by approximately 5% year-over-year to RMB 66 million.
